net.hockeyapp.android

Class Tracking

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.hockeyapp.android.Tracking

  • public class Tracking
extends java.lang.Object

    Description

    This class defines methods to track the app's usage time.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      protected static java.lang.String START_TIME_KEY
      Key for shared preferences to store a start time.
      protected static java.lang.String USAGE_TIME_KEY
      Key for shared preferences to store a usage time.

      • Tracking

        public Tracking()

    • Method Detail

      • startUsage

        public static void startUsage(android.app.Activity activity)
        Starts tracking of the usage time for the given activity. The current time is saved in shared preferences with a unique key.
        Parameters:
        activity - Instance of activity

      • stopUsage

        public static void stopUsage(android.app.Activity activity)
        Stops tracking of the usage time for the given activity. Reads the start time which was stored by startUsage and calculates the difference. This difference is then added to the total usage time for the current version.
        Parameters:
        activity - Instance of activity

      • getUsageTime

        public static long getUsageTime(android.content.Context context)
        Returns the usage time of the current version in seconds.
        Parameters:
        context - Context to access shared preference.
        Returns:
        Usage time in seconds.

      • getPreferences

        protected static android.content.SharedPreferences getPreferences(android.content.Context context)
        Helper method to return an instance of SharedPreferences.
        Parameters:
        context - Context to access shared preference.
        Returns:
        Shared preferences instance
